column2: Ancient Dwemer fortress of great importance. Keeping the Heart of Lorkhan, it is a source of power of both Tribunal and Dagoth Ur.
Small section of fortress dedicated to coordination of smuggler operations in Vvardenfell
Section of fortress dedicated to coordination of smuggler operations in Vvardenfell
Entrance gate to the fortress, enhanced with advanced Dwemer mechanisms
Fortified positions overlooking Red Mountain caldera. Allow defenders to easily observe and shoot at any invaders.
Changes to already difficult terrain that cause invading armies to only be able to perform most basic of maneuvers.
Expanded tunneling into Red Mountain causing invaders to wander aimlessly through fortress.
Open spaces in fortress tunnels, usually guarded by defenders, or allowing for surprise attacks.
Restored traps, originally designed by great Dwemer architects.
Quarters designated for defenders of Red Mountain.
Miniscule Blight storms, infecting ones who venture too far up the Red Mountain
Minor Blight storms, infecting and luring creatures around Red Mountain
Blight storms, infecting and luring creatures even outside of Ghostfence
Major Blight storms, infecting and luring creatures from most settlements on Vvardenfell.
Great Blight storms, infecting and luring creatures from furthest parts of Vvardenfell.
Small group of enchanters, focusing on creation of arms for armies.
Medium group of enchanters, focusing on creation of arms for armies.
Big group of enchanters, focusing on creation of arms for armies.
Big group of enchanters, focusing on creation of arms for armies, additionally enhanced by ancient, Dwemer knowledge.
Small group of enchanters, focusing on creation of armour for armies.
Medium group of enchanters, focusing on creation of armour for armies.
Big group of enchanters, focusing on creation of armour for armies.
Big group of enchanters, focusing on creation of armour for armies, additionally enhanced by ancient, Dwemer knowledge.
Slight alteration to dreams of some on Vvardenfell, opening mind to influence.
Dreams influencing weak-willed to follow Dagoth Urs orders.
Ash statues, given to many influential personalities, influence them to knowingly or not, help arm your army.
Small group of especially strong willed sleepers.
Medium group of especially strong willed sleepers.
Big group of especially strong willed sleepers.
Small meditation chamber, located close to Inner Sanctum of Dagoth-Ur.
Meditation chamber, located close to Inner Sanctum of Dagoth-Ur.
Big meditation chamber, located close to Inner Sanctum of Dagoth-Ur.
Experienced Ash Priests, helping sleepers reach Dagoth Ur through their dream.
Most experienced Gurus, helping sleepers and Ash Priests reach Dagoth Ur through their dream.
